Insert.Data: Group for ITSM ConfigItem mask access.
Group for ITSM Service mask access.
All closed state types (default: not viewable).
State type for merged tickets (default: not viewable).
Ticket is pending for agent reminder.
Ticket is pending for automatic close.
Ticket is pending for automatic close.
Ticket is pending for automatic reopen

Dear <KIX_CUSTOMER_REALNAME>,
Thank you for your request.

Your Ticket-Team
<KIX_Agent_UserFirstname> <KIX_Agent_UserLastname>
-- Super Support - Waterford Business Park 5201 Blue Lagoon Drive - 8th Floor & 9th Floor - Miami, 33126 USA Email: hot@example.com - Web: http://www.example.com/ --
Follow-ups for closed tickets are possible. Ticket will be reopened.
Follow-ups for closed tickets are not possible. No new ticket will be created.
Follow-ups for closed tickets are not possible. A new ticket will be created..
Some test answer to show how a standard template can be used.
Automatic reply which will be sent out after a new ticket has been created.
Automatic reject which will be sent out after a follow-up has been rejected (in case queue follow-up option is "reject").
Automatic confirmation which is sent out after a follow-up has been received for a ticket (in case queue follow-up option is "possible").
Automatic response which will be sent out after a follow-up has been rejected and a new ticket has been created (in case queue follow-up option is "new ticket").
Auto remove will be sent out after a customer contact removed the request.
default reply (after new ticket has been created)

This is a demo text which is send to every inquiry. It could contain something like:
Thanks for your email. A new ticket has been created.
You wrote: <KIX_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your email will be answered by a human ASAP
Have fun with KIX! :-)
Your KIX Team
default reject (after follow-up and rejected of a closed ticket)

Your previous ticket is closed.
-- Your follow-up has been rejected. --
Please create a new ticket.
Your KIX Team
default follow-up (after a ticket follow-up has been added)

Thanks for your follow-up email
You wrote: <KIX_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your email will be answered by a human ASAP.
Have fun with KIX!
Your KIX Team
default reject/new ticket created (after closed follow-up with new ticket creation)

Your previous ticket is closed.
-- A new ticket has been created for you. --
You wrote: <KIX_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your email will be answered by a human ASAP.
Have fun with KIX!
Your KIX Team
You will receive a notification each time a new ticket is created in one of your "My Queues" or "My Services".
You will receive a notification if a customer sends a follow-up to an unlocked ticket which is in your "My Queues" or "My Services".
You will receive a notification if a customer sends a follow-up to a locked ticket of which you are the ticket owner or responsible.
You will receive a notification as soon as a ticket owned by you is automatically unlocked.
You will receive a notification if a ticket is moved into one of your "My Queues".
You will receive a notification if a ticket's service is changed to one of your "My Services".
